articles.author: Brian Heater
articles.title: Apple Watch blood oxygen detection won’t be available on the Series 10 in the US - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple has not discussed whether the feature’s removal was a hardware change on the Series 10 or if it was simply disabled via the software, like with the Series 9.
articles.content: For all of the new health features Apple talked up at Monday’s iPhone 16 event, a familiar one was M.I.A. The blood oxygen feature, introduced with the Series 6 device, will not be present on Series … [+1131 chars]
